column4: i plan on installing ubuntu and  winxp on the same hdd... if i install ubuntu first, should i make sure to leave some partition space available for windows xp or does it not work that way?
ok, so if i install windows first, do i need to partition it to leave space for ubuntu?
roger that, thanks for the help guys
Yes. Probably the LiveCD will automatically repartition your drive, but if not you nust use GParted
